thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses USA | www.smartbuyglasses.com | 4 of 168
thread.title: VolvoMum 1

author: VolvoMum 1
title: VolvoMum 1
text:
Wow! Where do I begin. This is my 2nd pair of glasses from "SmartbuyGlasses" and no complaints. The RX is on point, and the quality of the frames are good. Customer Service is good. I've only used chat & email, they respond very quickly. The only downside is that I couldn't find a phone number to contact them.
I've purchased from at least 2 other online RX glasses companies and this is the most Consumer Oriented so far.
